name: Far Cry 6: Game of the Year Edition
summary:
Far Cry 6 Game of the Year Edition includes the base game, all Season Pass content, all game updates, the Ultimate Pack, and the new expansion, Lost Between Worlds (coming soon).

Welcome to Yara, a tropical paradise frozen in time. The award-winning Far Cry 6 thrusts players into a modern-day guerrilla revolution. Become a guerrilla fighter and liberate Yara, in solo or co-op.
